name: Two Dudes
description:
these two dudes are stuck on this block together and they can jump and make the block bigger to work their way through a maze of obstacles

The right arrow will make the right character jump and the left arrow will make the left character jump. You can use this to spin the two through the level and squeeze through tiny gaps. It's important to keep track of which side is up, the red bar indicates the top of the players, but it's still easy to confuse your left and right if you're not careful.
